contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Kōyō Kawanishi'''|川西 浩陽|Kawanishi Kōyō|extra=born January 18, 1959}} is a [[Japan]]ese [[dentist]] and amateur [[astronomer]].<ref>Lutz D. Schmadel (2003): ''Dictionary of minor planet names'', 5th ed., Springer-Verlag, p. 475. ISBN 3-540-00238-3</ref> He is a prolific discoverer of [[asteroid]]s. Asteroid [[5591 Koyo]] is named after him. == References == {{Reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Kawanishi, Koyo | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese astronomer | DATE OF BIRTH = 1959 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kawanishi, Koyo}} [[Category:Japanese astronomers]] [[Category:Discoverers of asteroids]] [[Category:Japanese dentists]] [[Category:1959 births]] [[Category:Living people]] {{japan-astronomer-stub}}
